title: Thresh Blood Moon skin quality
body: I have the Blood Moon Thresh Skin and in game the quality of the skin is like really bad. All the other character in the game look really high detailed but when it comes to Thresh he looks like hes in the lowest quality. I'm not sure if it's just me or the game.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Would you happen to have a screenshot?
My setting has Character Detail set to the highest and he still looks like this.

Thanks! 

After doing a bit of digging, it appears that several skins aren't scaling with Character Quality or Environment Quality - Blood Moon Thresh is one of these cases. We're currently in the process of fixing this!

That was quick! Have a cookie! :D
{{item:2054}}
Please :D appreciate it so my money don't go to waste!
I see what you mean. It looks like Best Performance in GW2.
For some reason, Blood Moon Thresh's quality is tied to environment quality. Turn it up and it'll look better.
No It looks bad trust me its not the background setting

Damn I thought I was the only one that had this problem.

For some reason, Blood Moon Thresh's textures are VERY blurry compared to other champions on the highest setting.

I know what you're saying, not going to lie, out of all the Blood Moon skins, Thresh looks a bit dated, but honestly the problem isn't the quality of the skin, but rather the detail! Blood Moon Thresh has so many smaller particles and is so busy, that his movements and abilities rather shroud the skin and make it look  not as refined as the others.
His default skin also has really low textures, which I find super sad since he looks so damn cool.
Yea I've noticed it's really bad too. The default skin is better. D:
